revised_title: Magnetic Survey of the West of France: Observations and Results
tldr: The author details a magnetic survey of the West of France, conducted by himself and Rev. W. Sidgreaves, using instruments from Stonyhurst Observatory. They collected data on dip, declination, and horizontal intensity at various stations, and provide maps of isodynamic, isoclinal, and isogonic lines. The study also discusses the secular variation and magnetic disturbances.
